page.title: 01Gazetteer - Our Area
page.content: Our Domesday Survey area lies 8 miles S.E. of{Shrewsbury,}the nearest market town and{Shropshire's administrative centre. The main A.458 road from{Shrewsbury to Bridgnorth}and {Kidderminster}crosses the area. The new town of{Telford}is 12 miles away to the N.E. The wide and fertile valley of the {River Severn}occupies about half the area, while the rest is land rising to an average level of 40m. above the valley floor. Almost all the land is devoted to mixed farming. The village of{Cressage}(pop. about 680) is the main centre of population. It is still very much a village in character, though it has expanded much in recent years. The village is important as a centre of road communications, and the whole area is popular with tourists and anglers.
